abstract: Karen Febles, 48, was convicted after a four-day trial of stealing $1.3 million from William R. Salomon, the 98-year-old son of a founder of Salomon Brothers.

lead_paragraph: A former secretary at Citigroup was found guilty late Monday of stealing $1.3 million from William R. Salomon, the 98-year-old son of a founder of Salomon Brothers.

headline.main: Former Assistant to a Salomon Is Found Guilty of Stealing $1.3 Million
